Articles.Content:
The young kids enjoy helping play Kerbal, though they mostly jostle my arm, press random buttons at inopportune times, and complain that "dots and line" mode (maneuver nodes) is boring. It does lead to a different playing style.

Some random explorations, including getting a rover stuck in the pool:

http://www.deater.net/weave/pictures/kerbal/kids/kids.html

A trip to Duna:

http://www.deater.net/weave/pictures/kerbal/kids_duna/kids_duna.html
